casebody.data:
Catawba County, et al.
v.
Loggins 152PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016 J. David Abernethy, Attorney at Law, David W. Hood, Attorney at Law, Hickory, for Catawba County (by and through its Child Support Agency), et al. Blair E. Cody, III, Attorney at Law, Hickory, for Loggins, Jason. John F. Maddrey, Solicitor General, Gerald K. Robbins, Special Deputy Attorney General, Benjamin J. Kull, Assistant Attorney General, for N.C. Department of Health and Human Services.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of May 2016 by NC Department of Health and Human Services for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within *208the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
